channel.title: kubectl on IBORA
channel.description: Recent content in kubectl on IBORA

item.title: kubectl命令详解
item.author: ender.viggin.coder@gmail.com (ender viggin)
item.description: kubectl简介 kubectl是一个用于操作kubernetes集群的命令行工具。 kubectl安装配置 osx linux windowns 1 2 3 4 brew install kubectl # 或者 curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$(curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/darwin/amd64/kubectl sudo mv kubectl /user/bin/kubectl && chmod +x /usr/bin/kubectl 1 2 curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$(curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl sudo mv kubectl /user/bin/kubectl && chmod +x /usr/bin/kubectl 1 curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$(curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/windows/amd64/kubectl.exe 'use strict'; var containerId = JSON.
item.dc:creator: ender viggin
